keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

byline.original: By DAN BILEFSKY and JAN RICHTER

lead_paragraph: The authorities said the 25-year-old mechanic’s arrest was the first known case of a Czech citizen trying to join the Islamic State.

headline.print_headline: Czech Is Charged With Attempted Terrorism
headline.main: Czech Man Is Charged With Attempted Terrorism

snippet: The authorities said the 25-year-old mechanic’s arrest was the first known case of a Czech citizen trying to join the Islamic State....
abstract: Czech citizen who was arrested while attempting to travel to Syria allegedly to join Islamic State is charged with attempted terrorism, in first case of its kind; arrest of man, identified only as Jan S, raises fears that homegrown Islamic radicalism has spread to Eastern and Central Europe.
